name: Raft Survival Ultimate
description:
Would you like to be alone from civilization?

Survival on Raft simulator will give you this opportunity and throws you into an epic adventure out on the ocean, with the objective to stay alive, gather resources and build a floating home worthy of survival. Remember, thirst and hunger is not the only danger in the ocean, watch out for the shark determined to end your adventure!

Island!
A whole island among the ocean on which you can build your house to forget about annoying sharks. However, do not forget that other dangerous predators may inhabit the island.

Secrets!
The island has many mysteries, the solution of which will give you the opportunity to discover new islands that hide in thick fog.

New territories!
Traveling across the ocean, you can find many different types of resources, open new islands, but do not forget to fulfill the proposed tasks first.

Features:
1. Use your hook to catch floating items.
2. Craft System - build survival equipment, weapons, crop plots and more.
3. Build - expand your raft from a wreckage to a buoyant fortress.
4. Shark - defend your buildings from the dangers of the ocean.
5. Awesome Graphics - for even more realism.
